channel.title: Making your character a
channel.description:
Hey, is it possible to change your character into something else? i know it sounds dumb but wouldnt it be awsome if you could see people walking around as a lesser demon or dragon...
please post. Thanks.

item.title: Making your character a
item.dc:creator: @imjammy780 imjammy780
item.description:
@imjammy780 wrote:

But can you make it so when the player starts he/she starts like that…?

Read full topic

item.title: Making your character a
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

If you dont have the command, here you go [code] if (command.startsWith(“pnpc”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));

            if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
                npcId = newNPC;
                isNpc = true;
                updateRequired = true;
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            } else {
                sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
        }
    }[/code]

Read full topic

item.description:
@imjammy780 wrote:

cool thanks, i will check now

item.title: Making your character a
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Yes it is.
First of all, search for in your client.java for “Pnpc” (With the quotation marks). If a command comes up, make sure its either set to 2 player rights or && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(Yourname) etc.

If that is so, then ingame you can just type ::pnpc NPCID

If not then you need to add the command.

Read full topic
